name: Design for a Frieze with Worshipers Bringing Sacrificial Offerings
description: Design for a Frieze with Worshipers Bringing Sacrificial Offerings; Lelio Orsi (Italian, 1511 - 1587); Italy; about 1555; Pen and brown ink and brown wash, heightened with white gouache, partially squared in black chalk, on ocher paper; 22.9 x 41.1 cm (9 x 16 3/16 in.); 90.GG.132; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Design for a Frieze with Worshipers Bringing Sacrificial Offerings
medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash, heightened with white gouache, partially squared in black chalk, on ocher paper
